name: Spacecraft (itch)
description:
Demo of the survival mode in Spacecraft. The game is best played with a Xbox 360 gamepad, or other gamepad.

Spacecraft is a local build & destroy deathmatch game for up to 4 players. The players first builds spaceships then fights to the death in them.

AGDG DEMODAY 7 major progress

  • Music adapts to game state; build music during building, battle music during battle.
  • New camera tracking system. Uses 3D camera instead of 2D
  • Add recoil to guns.
  • (and much more...)

Keyboard Controls

Build
Space Place
2 Continue tutorial (Y button)
SHIFT Toggle Ready
W S Change card
A D Change Position

Fight
Space Fire
SHIFT Mines
Arrow Keys Dash
W Accelerate
A D Turn
